about_the_game:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in several points of the story. A new button will appear in the options screen, allowing you to enable suggestive content in the game.

Requires the main game Summer In Trigue to download
https://store.steampowered.com/app/617980/Summer_In_Trigue/

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit uncensored sex scenes, as well as nudity.

All characters included in the game are over the age of 20.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content.

detailed_description:
This DLC enables adult (uncensored) content during the romance CG scenes and nudity in several points of the story. A new button will appear in the options screen, allowing you to enable suggestive content in the game.

Requires the main game Summer In Trigue to download
https://store.steampowered.com/app/617980/Summer_In_Trigue/

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Summer In Trigue Uncensor DLC

  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

short_description: The uncensor patch enables adult content on the game Summer In Trigue
